member.name: T:FinalTextEditor.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:FinalTextEditor.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:FinalTextEditor.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmAverageUnitsShipped.isValid(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Checks to see if the user input is a whole number and then if it is range. Displays a message box error output if the input is invalid.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmAverageUnitsShipped.resetForm
member.summary: Loops through the form to reset every control and variable to the original state.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmAverageUnitsShipped.btnEnter_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Stores the user's input if it passes the validation check into the two dimensional array. Also increments the day and employee counter if the input was valid. Once seven days worth of data have been inputed (all inputs for an employee), calculates and displays the average for that employee and moves to the next employee. Once all employee's data have been entered, calculates and displays the total average units shipped for all employees and locks the program so no more data can be entered until the user resets the program.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.NewForm(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Opens a new blank document using the frmTextEditor child class when the new button is clicked.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.OpenFile(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Opens a file when the open button is clicked, only allows .txt files.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.mnuAverageUnits_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Opens the Average Units Shipped program when clicked.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.btnSave_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Checks to see if the file is a text document. If it is, allows the user to save the file automatically, if it exists, or select a name and destination to save if not.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.SaveAs_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Nearly identical to the btnSave_click except it always opens the save dialog to allow the user to set the name and location they want for the file.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.Exit_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes the program when pressed.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.mnuCopy_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Copies the current selected text when clicked.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.mnuCut_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Copies then deletes the current selected text when clicked.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.mnuPaste_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Pastes any saved text to the currently selected location when clicked.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.CascadeToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When clicked, sets the layout of all the current child forms in a cascade style.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.TileVerticalToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When clicked, sets the layout of all the current child forms in a vertical style.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.TileHorizontalToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When clicked, sets the layout of all the current child forms in a horizontal style.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.mnuClose_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes the current active child form when clicked. If the form is a text editor and has any unsaved changes, it will prompt the user of this fact and give them a choice to close without saving or not.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.SaveAs(FinalTextEditor.frmTextEditor)
member.summary: A sub routine that creates a save dialog and calls upon the text editor child function that saves the current document.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.UnsavedChanges
member.summary: Creates a dialog check to see if the user wants to close the main program or not, when there are any unsaved changes. Returns a true or false boolean value depending on the user's choice.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.frmMain_formClosing(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs)
member.summary: This routine happens when the main form is closing through any method. If there are any unsaved changes to a text editor document, then it will prompt the user with a question to close without saving or not to close.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmMain.mnuAbout_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Shows a messagebox that displays some info about the program when clicked.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmTextEditor.SaveFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sub that creates a FileStream using the file path and sets the mode and access to create and write. Once the FileStream is created, creates a StreamWriter using the parameters from the FileStream and then writes the output (text/value in the textbox) to the new file.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmTextEditor.OpenFile(System.String)
member.summary: Function similar to SaveFile but instead reads the values of the file, saves them to a variable and then returns that variable back to the calling code.

member.name: M:FinalTextEditor.frmTextEditor.DynamicTitle(System.String)
member.summary: A function to change the title of the form to the file location and the action the user is doing.
